parameter.name: range
parameter.label: Range
parameter.description:
The range to allow (or reject when inverted) using interval notation.
  • [1..2] means to allow 1 <= value <= 2.
  • [1..2) means to allow 1 <= value < 2.
Unit of Measurement can be specified against a dimensioned channel, e.g. ( -18 °C .. -2 °C ). Begin-less and end-less ranges can be defined by omitting the corresponding value. For example: [..10] for <= 10 and [10..] for >= 10. Multiple ranges can be specified, e.g. [1..2], [5..8], [9..]

parameter.name: action
parameter.label: Range Action
parameter.description: Whether to allow or discard values within the given range.

options.option: Only allow values within the range
Only allow values outside the range
